item.description:
Trying to find time to write?

Hit a wall and need some inspiration?

Just looking for an idea or something to feed your creativity?

Join us for exercises. We'll provide a writing prompt and 10-15 minutes to create, followed by a chance for participants to read what they've drafted. It's a great chance to challenge yourself and hear what others come up with as well as share. We usually get in 5-6 prompts and try to include at least one that involves the whole group.

Bring your own writing materials; laptops are okay.
item.name: Boston Writer's Meetup: Exercise Night!
